short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to manage your tabs as workspace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Workspace is a powerful Chrome extension that enables you to effortlessly save your current tabs as custom workspaces. Organize all your tabs into logical groups and open them with a single click whenever you need.
